/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their gray and white facades standing out against the blue sky. A few trees and bushes add a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, a lamppost stands tall, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the scene. The image captures the essence of a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of urban architecture and natural elements.
